channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dollar Strengthens Ahead of Fed Minutes
item.description: The dollar rose ahead of Fed minutes set to be released today.

item.title: PepsiCo trims revenue outlook as North American snacking, key international markets lag
item.description: PepsiCo lowered its full-year outlook for organic revenue but reiterated its forecast for its earnings growth.

item.title: Samsung posts disappointing third-quarter profit guidance as it grapples with AI chips
item.description: Samsung posts worse-than-expected guidance for third quarter

item.title: GM expects 2025 earnings to be similar to this year's despite industry headwinds
item.description: The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes this year is between $13 billion and $15 billion, or $9.50 and $10.50 per...

item.title: TreasuryDirect to Bond Buyers: Moving Your Money Could Take a Year
item.description: Demand surged on the Treasury Departmentâ€™s clunky website for buying government debt, leading to a backlog of customer requests.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Mixed
item.description: U.S. stocks traded mixed, while chip stocks rallied and Chinese stocks had another roller-coaster day.

item.title: Vital That Coffee Industry Adapts to Climate Change, Illy Chairman Says
item.description: In a question-and-answer session, Andrea Illy discusses effects of climate change on coffee prices and challenges the sector faces.

item.title: Modelo brewer Constellation falls despite an earnings beat. Here's why we're not concerned
item.description: Constellation Brands on Thursday delivered a solid earnings report and set the stage for an anchor to be raised in the next two quarters.

item.title: Natural Gas Falls as Storm Looms
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures fell, with the market watching Hurricane Milton as it approaches Florida with the threat of devastation and power outages.

item.title: Levi Strauss trims guidance as it weighs sale of Dockers business
item.description: Denim maker Levi Strauss is looking to sell its Dockers brand as the khaki maker drags down the company's overall performance.
